name: Handl Pay
description: About Handl Pay: Handl is a peer-to-peer payments platform that turns social media usernames into cross-chain payment handles. We allow anyone to send and receive crypto and fiat without needing banking details, wallet addresses, bridges, or app downloads. Handl is built to support card payments, stablecoins, crypto assets, and local payment methods, routing all funds to a user-selected wallet or account. Mission: Handl aims to remove the complexity of global and cross-currency payments and by enabling frictionless peer-to-peer and business-to-consumer transactions using familiar social identities. Problem Statement: P2P payments today are still far too complicated. Sending crypto often takes 10â€“20 minutes, requiring multiple steps such as... Collecting and verifying the recipient's wallet details, choosing a chain, figuring out routing, possibly bridging or using a third-party remittance service... HANDL eliminates all of this. Sending money becomes as easy as sending a message. Blockchains supported: - Polygon - Ethereum - Avalanche - Base - BNB Chain - Soneium - Canton Network Social media platforms supported (users can turn their social media usernames into payment handles): - Gmail - Instagram - WhatsApp - Telegram - X - (More to come) Payment methods supported: - $USDC - Credit and debit cards - Apple Pay - (More to come)
